description:
Particularly sturdy, particularly comfortable – the lightweight Alta Bunion II LL hiking boot offers hikers with a bunion extra room at the big toe joint and forefoot thanks to its special Hallux Valgus Bunion Last. The result: optimum hiking comfort, free from pain. In addition, a reinforced PU foam wedge offers cushioning shock absorbency for balanced roll-off performance.

The combination of high-quality nubuck leather upper and breathable leather lining makes the Alta Bunion II LL a comfortable and reliable companion for hikes in terrain ranging from flatter regions to easier hut-to-hut tours in the Alps. Even after many years of service the Alta Bunion II LL can easily be resoled ready for further use.

*** All Hanwag boots are sold under UK sizing - Please see size chart for details/conversion.
name: HanWag Alta Bunion II LL - Mens
